attributes.action: Second referendum on Brexit, as the NHS, jobs & environment will be affected
attributes.additional_details:
A great number of ‘Leave’ promises were clearly fantasies and riddled with inaccuracies. Losing access to the EU market, which accounts for half of our trade would have a great impact on the future of the United Kingdom. 
A second referendum is our right!
attributes.background: The NHS will not receive an extra £350m a week for the NHS, as Boris Johnson falsely promised. We’ll have less money for public services, because the economy will be damaged. A second referendum is vital for the British people, now knowing the facts of how it is going to be bad, as we need the EU.
